Question: What are the attributes of the business located at '123 Main St, CityVille'?
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)
WHERE business.address="123 Main St, CityVille"
RETURN business, business.id, business.name, business.address, business.city, business.state, business.location
Rewrite: What characteristics does the business at '123 Main St, CityVille' have?

Question: Retrieve the name and description of the label with id 'L001'.
Cypher:
MATCH (labelNode:Label)
WHERE labelNode.id="L001"
RETURN labelNode, labelNode.description
Rewrite: Fetch the name and description for the label identified by id 'L001'.

Question: Can you show me the name of the city where the state is 'California'?
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)
WHERE business.state="California"
RETURN business, business.city
Rewrite: Could you tell me the name of the city located in the state of 'California'?

Question: What is the id and text of a review that was submitted on '2023-09-15'?
Cypher:
MATCH (review:Review)
WHERE review.date = date('2023-09-15')
RETURN review, review.id, review.text
Rewrite: Could you provide the id and text of the review submitted on '2023-09-15'?

Question: Find the name and partition number of the photo with the caption 'Beautiful sunset at the beach'.
Cypher:
MATCH (photo:Photo)
WHERE photo.caption="Beautiful sunset at the beach"
RETURN photo, photo.partition
Rewrite: Locate the name and partition number for the photo labeled 'Beautiful sunset at the beach'.

Question: Provide the user name and user id for the user who has the user id 'U100'.
Cypher:
MATCH (searchedUser:User)
WHERE searchedUser.id="U100"
RETURN searchedUser, searchedUser.name, searchedUser.id
Rewrite: Please supply the username and user id for the individual associated with user id 'U100'.

Question: What is the total number of unique business entries listed in the city of 'New York'?
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[locatedIn:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE city.name="New York"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT business)
Rewrite: How many distinct business listings are there in the city of 'New York'?

Question: How many reviews have been written by users in the year 2022?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)
WHERE review.date.year = 2022
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT review)
Rewrite: What is the number of reviews authored by users in the year 2022?

Question: Can you calculate the average number of stars given across all reviews?
Rewrite: Could you determine the mean star rating across all the reviews?

Question: What is the count of photos which have the label 'food' in their description, assuming all photos related to food contain this label?
Cypher:
MATCH (photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
WHERE label.description CONTAINS "food"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT photo)
Rewrite: How many photos are labeled 'food' in their description, given that all food-related photos are tagged with this label?

Question: Could you tell me how many users currently have more than 500 friends in the system?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[friendship:FRIENDS]->(friend:User)
WITH user, COUNT(friendship) AS friendCount
WHERE friendCount > 500
RETURN COUNT(user)
Rewrite: Can you inform me about the number of users who currently possess over 500 friends in the system?

Question: What is the maximum score attributed to labels assigned to the photos taken in the year 2023?
Rewrite: What is the highest score given to labels on photos taken in 2023?
